ai-kv15.4:1.1_0: Who is studying the drumn after a moment, a second, an instant, continually, and without present.
ai-kv15.4:2.1_0: should not correct them like this:
ai-kv15.4:2.5_0: “There are, mendicants, these three topics of discussion.
ai-kv15.4:2.8_0: ‘That is how it was in the past.’
ai-kv15.4:2.10_0: ‘That is how it will be in the future.’
ai-kv15.4:2.11_0: Or you might discuss the present:
ai-kv15.4:2.12_0: ‘This is how it is at present.’
ai-kv15.4:2.13_0: These are the three topics of discussion.”
ai-kv15.4:2.17_0: The discussion of the stain of stinginess is finished.
